title: Patch is scanning lots of files
body:
I started up league about 10 minutes ago and it was scanning files but now its up to 1400 files scanned??? what is happening is anyone else experiencing this this is getting pretty crazy

Update: I solved it by looking through other forums except now i gotta wait for 2000MB to download lol oh well better than nothing happening i guess

replies.body: Were you having problems before this occurred?
nope not at all it was only today that it has ever happened

Strange.

Did you edit the files manually or something? A rescan might be prompted if the file size of the League of Legends folder isn't what it expects it to be.
